select qna_id,q.account_id as account_id,title,content,group_no,divide_code,state_code,hit,register_date, count(group_no) as counts from qna as q left outer join employee as e on q.account_id = e.account_id left outer join member as m on q.account_id = m.account_id where state_code!=9 GROUP by group_no HAVING counts=1 order by qna_id desc limit 6

select teacher from (SELECT COUNT(o.account_id) as counts, o.account_id AS teacher FROM lecture_register as l INNER JOIN open_course as o ON l.open_course_id = o.open_course_id WHERE LEFT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 0 month),7) = LEFT(lecture_register_date,7) GROUP BY teacher ORDER BY counts DESC LIMIT 1) as t

select sum(tuition_fee*sumCounts) as sum, lecture_register_date from (select subject_id, sum(counts) as sumCounts,lecture_register_date from (select open_course_id, count(lecture_register_id) as counts, lecture_register_date from lecture_register where open_course_id in (select DISTINCT open_course_id from open_course where account_id=#{account_id}) and LEFT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 0 month),7) = LEFT(lecture_register_date,7) group by open_course_id) as lr join open_course as oc on lr.open_course_id = oc.open_course_id group by subject_id) as ss join subject as sb on ss.subject_id = sb.subject_id
